For the people that the game are  freezing in the first mission i manage to fix the problem editing the PARAF.SFO file using the PS3_SFO_Editor_LE.  you need to change the values of the firmware required when you open the file the default its 3.4100 changed to 3.55 specifically and save .this work for me and im using  kmeaw 3.55  try it and let me know if work for you.
